details.title: UK SANCTIONS - UKHMT

details.text: Aide to the President of the Russian Federation (Sep 2013 - ). Member of the Board of Trustees of the Skolkovo Foundation (reported 2013- ). Deputy Prime Minister and Chief of Staff of the Russian Government (May 2012 - May 2013). Deputy Prime Minister (Dec 2011 - May 2012). First Deputy Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office (May 2008 - Dec 2011). Deputy Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office, Aide to the President (Mar 2004 - May 2008). Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Transnefteprodukt (SOE) (Sep 2004 - Feb 2006).
details.title: BIOGRAPHY

details.text: Apr 2015 - Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine adopted a Resolution on recommending to the National Security and Defence Council of Ukraine (NSDC) to impose sanctions against persons responsible for illegal imprisonment of Ukrainian officer, Verkhovna Rada deputy and member of Permanent Delegation to Parliamentary Assembly of Council of Europe Nadiya Savchenko. Nov 2016 - no further information reported.
details.title: REPORTS
